body_html: I don't think we can do anything to solve it -- torch.optim is a package completely independent from torch.nn. It can be used in code that doesn't even use Modules, so we can't depend on having named parameters, and I want to keep it this way. Any ideas @soumith @colesbury?

body: I don't think we can do anything to solve it -- `torch.optim` is a package completely independent from `torch.nn`. It can be used in code that doesn't even use Modules, so we can't depend on having named parameters, and I want to keep it this way. Any ideas @soumith @colesbury?
